channel.title: Vps - have no clue?
channel.description:
As the title says I just bought a VPS and it came through, yet I have no idea how to use it.
Erm what I've done so far is logged into the VPS via remote desktop connection and copied all of my files over to the VPS. However when I click the run.bat it just opens and closes? .. I seriously have no clue on how to set up a VPS, I mean I don't even know if this is in the right forum but I'm just glad that it's actually came through..
Anyway here's a screenshot..
[IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/2q3yg01.png[/img]

item.title: Vps - have no clue?
item.dc:creator: @Cody_The_Coder Cody The Coder
item.description:
@Cody_The_Coder wrote:

  1. i own my own vps (Virtual private server) Witch contains a computer ONLY for portforwarding nothing downloaded. What you need to do is login to ur vps that you bought, turn it on , on ports 43594
    and there u go. run server.

And dont forget to put ur path right click run.bat and change the java to urs
need help?
add me gangscapevsupport@hotmail.com

Read full topic

item.title: Vps - have no clue?
item.dc:creator: @twinky12341 twinky12341
item.description:
@twinky12341 wrote:

yes it will stay on 24\7 as long as the vps doesn’t hve a error but don’t just do run.bat use a auto restarter.

item.description:
@Sp3ke wrote:

Anyway, once I’ve downloaded all that “stuff” will all I need to do is run the server? Then when I turn off my computer it’l stay on, right?
